task.summary: Default task
added the language enum Class
added the annotations for the Entity class
added the mapping for in the persistence xml
Updated the Language Enum
Added ReadMe
Added BookRepository
Added findAll and count methods
cleared the syntax error by adding Book alias
added the JTA annotaions for transactional support
added the Books Constructor
added the arqualian integration test
updated the arqualian integration test
added the default no arguments constructor
added the validation tests to the BookRepositoryTest class
Added bean validation annotations to the parameters
Added the text util class and also added the dependency of this class into Shrinkwrap
Added the Injection of TextUtil into BookRepository class
added the dependency for arquillian in the arquallian.xml file
Added the Number Generator Interface for generating the ISBN automatically
Injected the NumberGenerator interface into BookRepository class
added a test to check the Isbn starts with "14", added classes into shrinkwrap
updated the language enum and changed the proerty names to more meaningful ones
